LABEL: 0x4E23
STRING: The mask that covered their face looked like a diving suit.

LABEL: 0x4E5D
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x4E75
STRING: The drifting remains couldn't withstand the water pressure and were exposed hideously.

LABEL: 0x4EAF
STRING: Even though they had acted so menacingly, they met a dreadful end...

LABEL: 0x4EFF
STRING: It appeared that this accident was not caused by them after all.

LABEL: 0x4F45
STRING: They'd seemed like the enemy, but even they were only ROMLES employees and fellow colleagues.

LABEL: 0x4F9D
STRING: No matter how close they were to the passengers, they wouldn't commit a lover's suicide like this.

LABEL: 0x4FE9
STRING: I looked around and saw the same masks all around me.

LABEL: 0x5029
STRING: Some of them were still covering their owner's faces...

LABEL: 0x5077
STRING: Some of them must've been acquainted with Yukari even before they boarded the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x50F4
STRING: I wondered how Yukari felt about the flooded rear section.

LABEL: 0x513E
STRING: Slowly, I took my time to get to the lobby on the second floor.

LABEL: 0x5220
STRING: 「I've arrived at the lobby on the second floor.」

LABEL: 0x5255
STRING: 『How are you feeling?』

LABEL: 0x5284
STRING: 「Everything's fine.」

LABEL: 0x52A2
STRING: The lobby was no different from the front section.

LABEL: 0x52D4
STRING: The second floor of the rear section was the passenger room area.

LABEL: 0x5308
STRING: However, all the doors to the rooms had been brutally broken down.

LABEL: 0x5344
STRING: Which meant that there were no survivors on this floor...

LABEL: 0x5383
STRING: 『Check the spiral staircase first.』

LABEL: 0x53B6
STRING: 「Got it.」

LABEL: 0x53D0
STRING: The entrance to the staircase to the first floor...

LABEL: 0x53FA
STRING: There were two exits located in the circular lobby.

LABEL: 0x5436
STRING: Both of them were covered with metal plates and were completely closed off.

LABEL: 0x547A
STRING: There were no traces of people having escaped.

LABEL: 0x54AC
STRING: If the watertight doors closed before the water and people rushed in, then...

LABEL: 0x54F4
STRING: ...The first floor might be safe.

LABEL: 0x552E
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x5546
STRING: What did it matter?

LABEL: 0x556E
STRING: 「Damn it――!」

LABEL: 0x558A
STRING: I suppressed the urge to scream and clenched my fists tightly.

LABEL: 0x5620
STRING: Leaving the third floor,

LABEL: 0x563C
STRING: I had made my way down the stairs as fast as I could.

LABEL: 0x5662
STRING: And when I finally made it here to the second floor...

LABEL: 0x568A
STRING: There was no hope left here.

LABEL: 0x56AE
STRING: A surging current of water.

LABEL: 0x56CA
STRING: A swirling menace.

LABEL: 0x56E6
STRING: They could never have escaped, only delay their death.

LABEL: 0x5726
STRING: It was then that I realized...

LABEL: 0x5744
STRING: ...There was nothing they could have done.

LABEL: 0x5774
STRING: ...None of the people who escaped from the observation deck made it to the first floor.

LABEL: 0x57C4
STRING: So, Hikari was...

LABEL: 0x57E4
STRING: How had they felt, waiting for their own death amid a roar that drowned out even their own screams?

LABEL: 0x58F8
STRING: 『лл-kun, do you hear me?』

LABEL: 0x597F
STRING: 「Hiragino-san...?」

LABEL: 0x59A1
STRING: I heard Hiragino's voice.

LABEL: 0x59D4
STRING: 『That's... enough.』

LABEL: 0x59F4
STRING: 『Come back.』

STRING: 『I don't think you can take much more of this.』

STRING: 『And there's a limit to the amount of oxygen.』

LABEL: 0x5A7B
STRING: The remaining oxygen?

LABEL: 0x5A95
STRING: I hadn't paid any attention to it before, but this was the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x5AD3
STRING: If your oxygen ran out, naturally, you'd die.

LABEL: 0x5AFD
STRING: I checked the remaining oxygen level on the gauge on my hand.

LABEL: 0x5B37
STRING: It looked like there was enough left, but...

LABEL: 0x5B6B
STRING: I'd have to account for the worst-case scenario.

LABEL: 0x5BBF
STRING: 「...I'll be fine. I'm continuing the search.」

LABEL: 0x5BEF
STRING: I had come this far, and I wasn't about to turn back now.

LABEL: 0x5C2B
STRING: I had to bring back some results.

LABEL: 0x5C55
STRING: Even if they weren't good.

LABEL: 0x5C83
STRING: If I didn't... Touri would never be saved.

LABEL: 0x5CBB
STRING: Just like I wasn't――

LABEL: 0x5CDD
STRING: 「The stairs leading to the first floor are sealed with watertight doors.」

LABEL: 0x5D1B
STRING: 「Which means the first floor may not be flooded after all.」

LABEL: 0x5D57
STRING: 「If I could just get down there somehow...」

LABEL: 0x5DB9
STRING: 「I'll check if the elevator's okay.」

LABEL: 0x5DEB
STRING: A pillar ran through the center of both sections.

LABEL: 0x5E23
STRING: They were cylindrical in shape, and the elevators were inside the space in the center.

LABEL: 0x5E6F
STRING: I started walking toward the middle of the lobby.

LABEL: 0x5EB0
STRING: 『Wait!』

LABEL: 0x5ED0
STRING: 『The elevators are designed with emergencies in mind.』

LABEL: 0x5F18

LABEL: 0x5F6D
STRING: 『However――』

LABEL: 0x5F89
STRING: 『What do you intend to do?』

LABEL: 0x5FB8
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x5FD6
STRING: Couldn't I just enter and go down like normal?

STRING: Before long, I reached the front of the elevator.

LABEL: 0x60AF
STRING: Its exterior didn't show any signs of damage.

LABEL: 0x60EB
STRING: It was a far cry from the doors of the guest rooms, which had been completely shattered.

LABEL: 0x6125
STRING: As Yukari had said, its resistance to water pressure must be outstanding.

STRING: So, what was the problem...?

STRING: Yukari continued.

STRING: 『There's no indication on the monitor that a leak has occurred inside the elevator.』

LABEL: 0x621A
STRING: 『Therefore, it's probably safe to say...』

LABEL: 0x6248
STRING: 『...That it's still usable.』

LABEL: 0x627D
STRING: 「Then――」

LABEL: 0x62A8
STRING: 『However.』

STRING: 『As soon as you open that door on the second floor, the elevator will be completely flooded.』

STRING: 『At that moment, the elevator will become unusable.』

STRING: 『There would be no point.』

STRING: 「...So, does that mean I can't use it?』

STRING: 『It looks to be that way.』

LABEL: 0x6449
STRING: The staircase was sealed off.

STRING: 『лл-san.」

STRING: 『I understand that you don't want to come back empty-handed after going so far.』

LABEL: 0x656A

STRING: 「My life's not――」

STRING: 『Your willingness to throw away your own life is admirable, but――』

LABEL: 0x6650
STRING: 『If you don't return, we'll lose one of our precious diving suits.』

LABEL: 0x66E2
STRING: 『Now that the power system is damaged and contact with the surface has been lost, our situation is becoming a battle of attrition.」

LABEL: 0x6740
STRING: 『At this point, it would be bad to lose valuable resources.』

STRING: 「Don't say it like that!」

LABEL: 0x680C
STRING: 『...I'm sorry if I offended you.』

STRING: 『But those are the facts.』

LABEL: 0x6862

LABEL: 0x68C1

LABEL: 0x6935
STRING: I couldn't leave yet.

LABEL: 0x6961
STRING: There had to be a way.

LABEL: 0x6989

STRING: 『Do you understand?』

LABEL: 0x69DC
STRING: 『Please return at once.』

STRING: 「...If I can cut a hole somewhere and make an entrance to the first fl――」

LABEL: 0x6AB9

LABEL: 0x6AE6

LABEL: 0x6B00
STRING: I couldn't help but straighten my back at the change in tone from the matter-of-fact way she'd been speaking until now.

LABEL: 0x6B61

LABEL: 0x6B9D
STRING: 『That just means that the first floor will also get flooded!』

STRING: I hadn't realized... how simple it was.

LABEL: 0x6C7D
STRING: It reminded me of the pressurization room...

LABEL: 0x6C9D
STRING: A double hatch that connected the ship to the sea.

LABEL: 0x6CCD
STRING: Either way, the first floor would get flooded as soon as the floors were connected.

LABEL: 0x6D13
STRING: And if I tried opening one of the windows...

LABEL: 0x6D4B
STRING: I didn't even need to think about that.

LABEL: 0x6D86
STRING: 『...You're so exhausted that you can't even think straight.』

LABEL: 0x6DD2
STRING: 『There's nothing you can do there!』

LABEL: 0x6E07
STRING: ――There was nothing I could say.

LABEL: 0x6E29
STRING: Nothing I could do.

LABEL: 0x6E45
STRING: I could hear regret in Yukari's voice as she chided me.

LABEL: 0x6E7F
STRING: It was no wonder... She was in charge of this ship.

LABEL: 0x6EB3
STRING: She had said earlier that she would abandon the survivors, but that was just her way of persuading me.

LABEL: 0x6F15
STRING: The one carrying the most regret of us caught in this accident might be Yukari herself.

LABEL: 0x6F5B
STRING: I didn't know what feelings she harbored while telling me that there was nothing I could do.

LABEL: 0x6FA3

LABEL: 0x7008

STRING: 「Tokiwa...」

STRING: On the other end of the radio, Yukari inquired about the meaning of her words.

STRING: 『We'll use the elevator.』

STRING: 『...As I said, there's no point.』

STRING: 『Did you?』

STRING: 『...Enough.』

STRING: 「Wait, please!」

STRING: 『Heave-ho!』

STRING: 『H-Hey, Saihouji-san! What are you――』

STRING: 「Hello?」

STRING: 「Hey!」

STRING: 『Sorry to keep you waiting.』

STRING: 『So, let me explain.』

STRING: I wasn't brave enough to ask what she had done to Yukari.

LABEL: 0x7809
STRING: Tokiwa continued as if nothing had happened.

STRING: 『Why, it's very simple.』

STRING: 『We can use the elevator shaft as a pressure chamber.』

STRING: 『First, we open the elevator doors.』

STRING: I see...

STRING: So it might be possible to go there without submerging the whole floor.

STRING: 「There are three things I want to know.」

STRING: 『In that case, it's impossible. Pray that it's stuck on the third floor.』

STRING: ...Seriously?

STRING: 『No need to worry about that.』

STRING: 「And lastly――」

STRING: 「Can the outer door of the elevator be operated from the wheelhouse?」

STRING: 『Oh, I see. Indeed.』

STRING: 『Well, it should be?』

STRING: That's what I'm asking you!

STRING: Why are you talking like it's not your problem...

STRING: 「Can you make sure, please?」

STRING: 『Yes, sir. Just a moment.』

LABEL: 0x8404

STRING: Her groans and the clicking sound stopped simultaneously.

STRING: 「...Well?」

STRING: 『It's hard to use a mouse when you're not used to it. I'm more of a cat person myself, by the way.』

STRING: 「...Tokiwa-san.」

STRING: 『It should be fine.』

STRING: 『If you fall down the shaft before it fills with water, there's no guarantee you'll be safe.』

STRING: 『So please keep a safe distance and hold on to something, лл-san.』

LABEL: 0x899F
STRING: 「Understood.」

STRING: 「Ready.」

STRING: 『We're opening the door――』

STRING: 『Open, Sesame!』

STRING: The feel of the water surrounding me changed.

STRING: 「Shit――!」

STRING: Good.

STRING: 「Yeah, looks good. I'm going down the shaft now.」

STRING: I jumped inside gently and put my hand on the cable.

STRING: 『Are you ready?』

STRING: 「...Haah, haah...」

STRING: 『лл-san!!』

STRING: A voice called out in my ear.

STRING: 「I can hear you...」

STRING: 『лл-san...』

STRING: 「I banged myself up a bit but... nothing major.」
